short_title: Truth in Healthcare Marketing Act of 2021

summary.text:
Truth in Healthcare Marketing Act of 2021

This bill prohibits as an unfair or deceptive trade practice a person from misrepresenting (1) whether the person holds a state health care license; or (2) the person's education, training, degree, license, or clinical expertise.

A person's advertisement for the person's health care services must disclose the license under which the person is authorized to provide those services.
